description: Family favourite. The addition of a pear adds natural sweetness.
name: Apple Crumble Pie For Two Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Oil and line 2 small pie tins with sheets of shortcrust pastry. Pierce base of each. Put to one side.
Peel and dice apples and pear. Place in pot and mix in water, lemon juice, cinnamon and ground cloves. Lightly stew.
Whilst fruit is cooking make crumble topping by mixing into a bowl flour, butter, milk and honey. I use my fingers to do this, until the mixture looks like breadcrumbs. Put to one side.
By now the fruit should be lightly cooked, roughly 5-10 minutes. Pour fruit equally into the 2 pie tins.
Divide crumble and place on top of the fruit. Cook in oven at 180c for approximately 30 minutes.
Ready to eat with cream, ice cream or custard.
